body_html:
Ok, now it seems that it crashed with gdb:

(gdb) r -c "import torch; print(torch)"
Starting program: /usr/bin/python -c "import torch; print(torch)"
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
[New Thread 0x7ffff344a700 (LWP 26765)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff2c49700 (LWP 26766)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff0448700 (LWP 26767)]
[New Thread 0x7fffedc47700 (LWP 26768)]
[New Thread 0x7fffeb446700 (LWP 26770)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe8c45700 (LWP 26771)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe6444700 (LWP 26772)]

Thread 1 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0000000000002360 in ?? ()

body:
Ok, now it seems that it crashed with gdb:

```
(gdb) r -c "import torch; print(torch)"
Starting program: /usr/bin/python -c "import torch; print(torch)"
[Thread debugging using libthread_db enabled]
Using host libthread_db library "/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libthread_db.so.1".
[New Thread 0x7ffff344a700 (LWP 26765)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff2c49700 (LWP 26766)]
[New Thread 0x7ffff0448700 (LWP 26767)]
[New Thread 0x7fffedc47700 (LWP 26768)]
[New Thread 0x7fffeb446700 (LWP 26770)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe8c45700 (LWP 26771)]
[New Thread 0x7fffe6444700 (LWP 26772)]

Thread 1 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x0000000000002360 in ?? ()
```
